title: SSVR Attestation Log Interface Definition
description: Defines the mandatory structure for the SSVR attestation_log field, ensuring machine-verification of the consensus quorum.

quorum_threshold.description: Defines the required minimum ratio (2/3) of Global Anchor Signers (GAS).

successful_signers.description: List of required cryptographic attestation proofs, exceeding the quorum threshold.

cstl_transaction_id.description: Unique reference hash to the immutable record in the Consensus State Transaction Log (CSTL).
